issue.title: [R] Add bindings for compare and boolean kernels
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-6982](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6982). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
See cpp/src/arrow/compute/kernels/compare.h and boolean.h. ARROW-6980 introduces an Expression class that works on Arrow Arrays, but to evaluate the expressions, it has to pull the data into R first. This would enable us to do the work in C++ and only pull in the result.
